tool_description: Analyzes competitor products and pricing to provide market positioning insights and competitive intelligence for pricing and feature decisions.

product_category.description: Product category to analyze for competitive landscape

competitor_urls.description: URLs of competitor product pages to analyze

analysis_depth.description: Analysis scope: pricing, features, or comprehensive

market_region.description: Geographic market for analysis: US, EU, APAC, or global

error_messages: Invalid category: Provide a valid product category for competitive analysis
Invalid analysis depth: Use one of [pricing, features, comprehensive]
Invalid market region: Use one of [US, EU, APAC, global]
Analysis failed: Unable to retrieve sufficient competitor data for meaningful analysis
usage: Specify product_category for analysis; optionally provide competitor_urls for focused analysis and set analysis_depth and market_region for customized insights.

price_range.description: Minimum and maximum competitor prices found

market_position.description: Suggested positioning: budget, mid-market, premium, or luxury
